txt.en: Faltharan can be found at the steps to Tol Ciryarani.\n\nSpeak with Faltharan to head to the shipyard.
Faltharan can be found at the steps to Tol Ciryarani.\n\nYou should speak with Faltharan.
Join Faltharan as he says his good-byes
Faltharan can be found at the steps to Tol Ciryarani.\n\nYou should speak with Faltharan.
'Come, let us make our way to the docks. I don't intend to stay for longer than is necessary, but I wish to make sure everything is in order for their departure.'

'And so, the ship has left our gates to make way towards the western coast. It had to be done, [placeholder], for I cannot guarantee their safety here, nor my own.\n\n'Hopefully it will reach Dol Amroth without incident. I would only expect to set my mind at rest once I've heard word from them, but until that day comes, I must carry out my duties.'
Faltharan has asked you to accompany him as his family departs for more safe lands.

'All the plans are set, and we are finally ready to set our matters into motion.

'Pelargir is a city that deserves to be restored to its former glory. With that, we will need to preserve its people, as well as its bloodline. We cannot protect everyone from the storm that has arrived, but we can try to steer them away from it.

'I understand that my family wishes to speak before their departure. Will you accompany, [placeholder]?'
